get.summary: Returns a single credential using the vc.id

post.summary: Verify a EIP-712 or JWT VC signed by a 3id

Given a request body with a schema url and fields, generate and return a signed credential. This will also write to the recipient's data backpack. To skip signing, set skipSign to true in the request data.

delete.summary: Archive a credential, can also use PATCH to update isArchived value

200.description: Returns a collection of Verifiable Credentials

get.description:
Returns a collection of Credentials for a given credential type (based on Credential 
    schema) for a given Eth Address. Available schemas and their types can be found at 
    https://github.com/discoxyz/disco-schemas.
get.summary: Filter out a type of Credentials for an Eth Address

parameters.description: The Eth Address of the Credential holder
parameters.name: eth

parameters.description: The type of Credentials to filter
parameters.name: types

post.summary: Returns all credentials for an array of dids

400.description: One or more of the dids passed in to the request are invalid or not supported.

post.description:
Takes a MultiDidRequest object. For this method, regardless of the value for tab only 'inbox' will be use, so it can be left empty. 
    The response include an array of VCDoc limited by the page and size params and a count of total VC documents matching the request criteria.
post.summary: Returns all inbox credentials for an array of dids

400.description: One or more of the dids passed in to the request are invalid or not supported.

post.description:
Takes a MultiDidRequest object. For this method, regardless of the value for tab only 'sent' will be use, so it can be left empty. 
    The response include an array of VCDoc limited by the page and size params and a count of total VC documents matching the request criteria.

post.description:

    The response include an array of VCDoc limited by the page and size params and a count of total VC documents matching the request criteria.
